extDesc.message: Will enable you to scroll by dragging while holding down the space key, just like photo processing or illustration creation apps.

desc_space.message: Pressing Ctrl (Windows) or Command (macOS) and the space key together will scroll.

desc_shift.message: Start by pressing the custom key while holding down Shift.

desc_ctrl.message: Start by pressing the custom key while holding down Ctrl (Windows) or Command (macOS).

label_key.message: Click to edit the custom key
